scripts.create-public: if not exist public mkdir public
scripts.build: npm run delete-public && npm run build-frontend && npm run create-public && npm run copy-build
scripts.prepare-dist: if exist dist rd /s /q dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist\uploads && xcopy /s /e /i /y public dist\public\ && xcopy /s /e /i /y uploads dist\uploads\
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run prepare-dist && pkg . --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist\ImageUploader.exe
